rules_text:
[i]Careful Youth[/i] – Lianna can't attack or block unless another creature is attacking or blocking.
[i]Gather the Gleamstones[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Lianna gets +1/+1 for each color among legendary creatures you control. Activate this only once each turn.
Partner with Rowan, Prince of Aytolis [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Rowan into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
